level.heading: One- and two-family dwellings.
level.text: ยง 27-823 One- and two-family dwellings. Floor furnace enclosures shall be constructed of noncombustible materials with a fire resistance rating of at least one hour. Means shall be provided for supporting the furnace when the floor grille is removed. Clearances shall be as provided in reference standards RS 14-15 and 14-16.
